answer_text: ['Thank you Mara_Gt for your review, I am so sad to hear about this disappointing experience you had with us in Bokan and the attitude from Martina. Please accept my sincere apologies. I can confirm that we have certainly taken action with regards to your feedback. I would really appreciate it if you could contact me directly on h9057-gm@accor.com to discuss a return visit to Bokan and how I can make sure you have an amazing experience. Kind regards and I look forward to hearing from you. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['I am coming very often at Bokan with my friends and always had a great experience, nice cocktails and friendly staff. However yesterday evening we did face a different attitude from the bartender Martina which was very rude to us and did not prepare the cocktail that we have asked and when we asked her for the cocktail that we wanted she started to argue saying that this is the cocktail and even start to laugh with her colleague and talking about us. I was shocked that at Bokan they still have people with this kind of attitude that don’t even bother about the guest requests. Very unprofessional. Really hope the management will take further actions.']
title: Very disappointed

answer_text: ['Thank you Mr George 2015. I am so sorry about this experience. I would really appreciate it if you could contact me directly on h9057-gm@accor.com to discuss this issue further. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['Went for a drink at the bar but was ignored by staff. So I cannot comment on drinks or food. Restaurant might be nice but avoid the bar.']
title: Completely ignored by staff on a quiet Sunday evening

answer_text: ['We love your 5 star review about your recent experience with us for your girlfriends birthday in Bokan. Oh my favourite is the Old Venus too so delighted Martina recommended this one :). We are looking forward to welcoming you back soon and we are launching a brand new cocktail list in the New Year so always an excuse to come and try a new one. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ["Me and my girlfriend went for couple of drinks to celebrate her b-day at Bokan bar 38. We been served by Martina, who recommend us very nice cocktail called 'old venues' which we really enjoyed and planning to come back to see amazing view from the bar and scenery of the river and city center. Truly recommended."]
title: Amazing drinks

answer_text: ["Thank you for our 5 star review, we love it acasadiluisa. I would also like to thank the waiter who recommended us. We did have a few negative reviews and we don't get it 100% right al the time but the negative reviews spurred us on to ensure we try really hard to get it right most of the time :). I am so happy that you enjoyed our view and of course our cocktails and we can't wait to welcome you back soon. Jacqui & The Bokan Family"]
content: ["I was reccomended this venue by a waiter in another restaurant, I was skeptic upon reading the reviews but I decided why not to give it a shot. I don't understand the negative reviews! The place gets pretty crowded but that's normal when the view and the cocktails are so great! I didn't have any food but upon prying from other tables it looked great. I guess I will have to go back for that :)"]
title: Good drinks, amazing view

answer_text: ['We absolutely love your review, thank you so much for sharing your 5 star experience with us. Breno will be thrilled with his personal mention and the feedback on how well he looked after you. We are really looking forward to welcoming you back soon. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['This was my first time visiting the Bokan having seen/heard many positive comments. My initial perception of the place was that it seemed very cool and modern which was followed by a vibrant atmosphere. I was lucky enough to find a window table which showcased just how amazing London is and how the Bokan Bar rooftop bar is truly a picturesque setting. The staff were friendly, in particular a guy named Breno who was highly attentive and provided a personable service. We were one of, if not the last persons to leave the bar and he ensured our glass was always full until the minute we left. Thanks Breno for your fantastic service and thank you Bokan for offering such a fantastic place to enjoy drinks in London. I will be returning. 100% recommended. My only feedback would be to extend opening hours.']
title: Bokan Rooftop Bar

answer_text: ['Thank you hhhh1973. I am so sorry about this issue. I really want to investigate this further and would appreciate it if you could drop me an e-mail me with the date and time that you came to visit us. This is absolutely not acceptable - my e-mail is h9057-gm@accor.com. Thank you and I look forward to hearing from you. Kind regards. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['First waiting for a table at the entrance to see the staff letting others without reservation overtake us. Then at the table to waiter was so arrogant and rude that we simply left. Fantastic view though.']
title: We left

answer_text: ["We really love your 5 star review and rating about Bokan. It really is a beautiful place to visit for summer drinks. However I hope Co0ops that you won't wait until the summer to come back and visit. Jacqui & The Bokan Family"]
content: ['Perfect roof top bar in Canary Wharf for summer drinks and catching up. On occasion they have a live band which adds to the chilled out vibes! ', 'Not eaten anything other than snack food. Drinks are decent. If they wanted to go for perfection would include bar service on the roof top.']
title: Love this place in the summer!

answer_text: ['Thank you. As requested on my other responses to your social media posts including your 5 star review I would appreciate it Yvonne G if you could contact me directly with regards to your feedback. Kind regards. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['We visited the bar in December 2019. Waiting for a long time to be seated. Very nice views of London. Staff tends to ignore you. Cocktails served in different types of glasses. We did not enjoy the food in the restaurant.']
title: Nice views shame about the staff

answer_text: ['We love your review Rob, thank you so much for sharing your brilliant review about Bokan and your experiences with us. I agree it really is a perfect place to start the weekend. Looking forward to welcoming you back soon. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Bokan is a 3 level rooftop bar, with a view over whole London, from the City. The atmosphere is relaxed and cheerful, there is live music and friendly service. The prices are very reasonable and it is just a perfect start for a Friday night! ', 'There is also an outside area where you can sunbath, and smoking is permitted there. There are also heaters to be able to enjoy it when it is cold. ', 'All in all, a fantastic place, perfect to start the weekend at!']
title: Brilliant Bokan

answer_text: ['We really enjoyed reading and sharing your amazing review MSTR6, thank you so much. We do change our bar menu very often so thank you for the feedback. I hope we can welcome you back to Bokan soon. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ["It's obvious most come for the views which are spectacular. The staff are very friendly and pleasant. The security seemed good too as there were a few guys walking around and keeping an eye out. That's crucial especially with a place so high up. ", "The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is that the food is so limited in the bar - I guess it's best just for drinks but other bars offer greater menu variety and considering there's a restaurant below, it could offer more."]
title: Amazing views and nice staff

answer_text: ['Thanks Steve for your review about your experience in Bokan and I am so pleased you enjoyed the beautiful sunset. Service charge is always optional with us at Bokan. I do hope you will come and visit us again soon. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['Stayed in Novotel. Used Boken bar on 38th floor and rooftop. £9.50 for glass of Prosseco and £3 for bottle of Coke plus 12.5% service charge even if you order at the bar ! Open to non residents. Worth going once (sunset) to catch the views over London. Restaurant and food not used. SX']
title: Great views but you pay for them

answer_text: ['Thank you 1987m for your feedback. I am so sorry we have let you down on this occasion with regards to your visit to Bokan 38. Please be assured that I am addressing this with the team. If you would consider giving us another chance, please contact me directly on h9057-gm@accor.com. Many thanks. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['This wasn’t my first time at Bokan’s but this time was disappointing. Apart from the warm greeting by Constantine at our arrival and the spectacular views of London, the service, especially from one waitress was poor. It took a long time to order, she did not smile once and after ordering four drinks and four dishes, she presented the bill which already included 12.50% service charge demanding we pay it in full before taking one sip and well before receiving our food! If this is the bar’s policy (very peculiar to pay for food and service before even receiving it!), you should inform customers and explain it in a professional and friendly manner. The food wasn’t even that great. Only worth the views. ']
title: Fab views, bad service

answer_text: ['We are so thrilled RJK010 that you enjoyed your experience in Bokan and thank you so much for sharing. We do get extremely busy especially in the summer time. Our views are fabulous over London and I am so glad you enjoyed them as much as we do. Looking forward to welcoming you back to Bokan soon. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['I guess the main reason for visiting Bokan if you are not staying at the hotel is the spectacular view across the city. That is the reason we went for drinks here and it was very pleasant. It was busy and therefore service at the bar was slow but you do not come here if you are in a hurry so no problem. £10 for two bottles of Peroni seemed reasonable in the circumstances and we enjoyed our drinks and the amazing view.']
title: Worth a visit.

answer_text: ['Thanks so much Fer F for taking the time to review your experience. I am pleased that overall you enjoyed your time with us and I am sorry that you felt the portions were small. I do hope we can continue to welcome you to Bokan. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ["Ate here with friends from out of town, had been many times for drinks but not to the restaurant. The food was delicious though the portions were quite small and dinner took an hour and a half to arrive so didn't hazard ordering desert. "]
title: Delicious food, very slow service

answer_text: ['Thank you Gemma B for your review. With regards to service charge, it is quite normal to charge this in most of the bars in our area and of course you can refuse to pay this, even after you have paid. Please contact me directly on h9057-gm@accor.com and I would be delighted to refund this onto your card. I am sorry that you were not made aware of it ad I hope you will give me the opportunity to rectify this situation. Kind regards. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['Went after work last few for couple of drinks - didn\'t realise until end of the evening a 12.5% service charge was added to every round or drinks that WE ordered at the bar. Then WE took back to our seats?? Can\'t understand why that was - service is for "service" not for someone doing their job/making drinks?? It does not say this anywhere until you have actually paid for your drinks and then it is on the receipt.', 'We were actually there to have a look at maybe booking for an event but this will not be happening now. View good but we can see the same from out offices across from the bar. Will not be going back.']
title: Service charge for drinks?

answer_text: ['Thank you so much Tricia M for taking the time to review your Bokan experience and we are thrilled that you enjoyed our amazing views and of course our friendly staff. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback and I hope we can welcome you back in the future. Kind regards. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Visited here in Sept with my son so that we could experience the views from the bar and we were not disappointed. Staff are courteous and friendly. We ordered a couple of drinks but they also do some light bites that did look really nice. We were pushed for time so ordered a dish of salted mixed nuts to go with our drinks and we then relaxed and took in the views. Would highly recommend this place for a nice drink, great staff and wonderful views across the city.']
title: Amazing Views

answer_text: ['Thank you cm9720 for your review about your Bokan experience. We are thrilled that you loved the views and I hope we can welcome you back soon. Many thanks. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Worth the view. We popped in here for a drink after work. It was a cloudy day but the view was amazing. G&T was £10 which is a bit pricey but probably par for the course in this area ']
title: Worth the view. We popped

answer_text: ['We love your 5 star review and fabulous feedback. I hope we can welcome you back soon. Kind regards. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['We loved it! Absolutely fabulous view. Service really nice and polite, food delicious, worthy to visit. ']
title: love it

answer_text: ['We are delighted with your 5 star review about your recent experience in Bokan. Thank you Pigalle1966 for sharing your Bokan experience. Delighted you enjoyed our drinks and snacks whilst looking over London. Would be great to see you again soon. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ["The views to the city with the tower bridge and Shard are amazing, there's also an open terrace and there's a great selection of drinks and snacks to pair the view ;-)"]
title: Amazing views on the city!

answer_text: ['Thank you Michael P for your review. I am so sorry about these issues you had and I would really appreciate it if you could contact me directly to discuss this on h9057-gm@accor.com. Many thanks and I look forward to hearing from you. Kind regards. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['My wife and I celebrated our 1-year anniversary and booked Bokan, mostly for its lofty and impressive position on the 38th floor of the Novotel hotel in Canary Wharf, London. The view did not disappoint and we could see pretty much the whole of London from up there.', 'Our table was booked for 8pm but they kept us waiting until 9pm, feeding us a constant stream of BS excuses ("The occupants of the table have just ordered another drink", "the occupants of the table have now asked for the bill, so it won\'t be much longer", etc.). ', 'The waiting staff were patronising and inflexible and suggested that we ordered drinks at our expense until the table came free. At no time was any apology or solution offered. ', "Bokan? Bo-can't."]
title: Pretty nice view, OK food, worst service in the world

answer_text: ['We love our 5 star rating 318nd, thank you so much for sharing. The views are stunning and we are also thrilled that you loved the interior of the bar too. I am sure we will be welcoming you back soon and we are looking forward to it. Many thanks again for this great feedback. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Stunning views from both inside and out. Busy and difficult to get a seat, and definitely not cheap. Two cocktails were almost £25 once service charge had automatically been added - and you order your own drink from the bar so the definition of ‘service’ has been somewhat stretched. However, views really do make up for the cost.']
title: Amazing View

answer_text: ["Thanks Abbie1984 for taking the time to rate your Bokan experience. I am thrilled that you enjoyed your time with us. Next time you come, please just let my amazing bar talent know what you like in a cocktail other than Gin and they will make it for you. I personally recommend the Old Venus which is actually tequila based and whilst I don't like tequila normally this is such a refreshing cocktail. Hope to welcome you back soon. Jacqui & The Bokan Family"]
content: ["Nice decor, friendly staff, great views, good atmosphere, cocktails were quite expensive and although worth the price for the view and surroundings just weren't to my taste as most of them were Gin based which I know is the 'in' drink but if you're not a fan of gin like me you might be disappointed with the cocktail menu. "]
title: Great views, good atmosphere, cocktails ok

answer_text: ["Thank you for your lovely feedback kcollyer. I can't wait to share your feedback with our amazing team in Bokan, who I know will be thrilled to hear you enjoyed your visit.", 'Warm regards,', 'Sarah Martin', 'Guest Experience Manager']
content: ['I arrived in an evening with friends, the view of London skyline at night is awesome, the service was great and the food hit the spot.']
title: An amazing location, food is excellent and the views are something else

answer_text: ['We just love your review about your date night with us at Bokan, we are thrilled that you enjoyed your time with us so much. Coco is fabulous and I am delighted with your feedback about how well he looked after you, he will be rewarded for this of course. Our views are beautiful, my favourite times are sun rise and sun set. I am sure we will be welcoming you back soon. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['I visited the Bar and rooftop for date night last weekend and it was a lovely night. Coco was a fantastic waiter and he made sure my partner and I had a wonderful experience. The vibe was nice and the food was good. The rooftop was a perfect finish. The bar was quite busy but this is expected on a Saturday night. I would recommend and definitely visit again. The view is breath-taking, you really do see the beauty of London at night.!']
title: Amazing evening!

answer_text: ['Thank you Simon for your lovely review about your first experience in Bokan, I am sure it will not be your last. Our menu may look smaller however it changes very regular with the season and we use only the best produce with everything made in house and on the day including the wonderful desserts. I hope we can welcome you back soon for your second visit to us. Many thanks. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Although the menu is somewhat limited, with a choice of only 6 entree & mains, everything we ordered was thoroughly delicious. Plus you really can’t knock the amazing views! 4/5* Recommended #Bokan ']
title: First visit to Bokan

answer_text: ['Thank you for your lovely review Ivarocks! We are thrilled you love visiting Bokan 38 & 39 and look forward to welcoming you back again soon for some more delicious cocktails. Veni will be delighted to hear your feedback!', 'Warm regards,', 'Sarah Martin', 'Guest Experience Manager']
content: ['I absolutely love this place! I make sure I stop by every time when I’m in London. The views are breathtaking, cocktails always different and the staff very friendly. Veny is my favorite- always there with a smile on her face, polite and ready to help you. I can’t wait to be back soon!']
title: the best view in town!

answer_text: ['Thank you IngoH77 for taking the time to review your experience in Bokan 38. I am so sorry that we let you down with the length of time it took with regards to the service and please be assured that I am addressing this. I do hope you will visit us again next time you stay with us, and thank you for already staying with us 4 times :). Many thanks. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['Stayed at the Novotel for the fourth time and did not want to go out for a late dinner. So I decided to go to the Bar and have something from the bar menu. ', 'Entered the bar at about 8.30, received the Menu approximately 10 minutes later. Taking the order took another 10 and serving the fish fingers with fries took 45 minutes. Not such a complicated dish I would have thought. ', 'Food itself was ok and hot. Nothing special though and had definitely better fish and chips before (for a better price). But in the end nothing to complain about the food itself. ', 'Friendly service, but the long waiting time brings it down. How good that the view is amazing so you have something to look at while you are waiting.']
title: Okay Food, ridiculous long waiting for it, amazing view

answer_text: ['Thank you AndyD885 for taking the time to review your experience in Bokan, we are thrilled that you enjoyed it so much and of course we have to agree that the views are absolutely stunning. I hope you will visit us again next time you are in London. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['We are staying at the hotel, had lunch here. ', 'Outstanding views make it worth paying a bit more for food and drink.', 'We only had a snack, a beer and a wine, the bruschetta was gorgeous. The beer was £7 for a small bottle, but tasty. Expensive? Very, you’re not going to get drunk here. Have a beer and a nibble, soak up the views and forget you’ve paid a few extra pounds for the privilege. ']
title: Gets a 5 for the views

answer_text: ['We absolutely love your review about your experience on Sunday night in Bokan 38 and so glad you decided to pop in for a visit. We really enjoyed sharing your feedback with our talent and we are all looking forward to welcoming you back soon. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['I went on a walk on Sunday evening and was not dressed to visit a Rooftop bar. Suddenly, I passed the bar by hazard - I have seen it before on TripAdvisor but never visited it. So I thought might be good to quickly visit it.', 'Amazing bar, very friendly service, great athmosphere, outstanding view. I will definitively come back!']
title: Hidden Gem - outstanding view!

answer_text: ["Thank you Vitalie for your review. I am sorry if you found that the service was slow for food and the wait of 20 minutes for fresh fries was too long. We do have 2 bar's available for our guests and then our terrace so if the music is too loud and the bar too lively on the 38th floor, we have quieter area's on the 39th floor which may have been a better option for you. I do hope we will welcome you back to Bokan 38 & 39 soon. Kind regards. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager"]
content: ['I ve been for the first time there, nice view but if you want some food at the bar, the best is to order the food first and the the drinks later, cuz it may take a while (in my case took more than 20 mins for some fries), the music is soo loud, it s like u re in a club, you can’t even have a discussion with the friends.']
title: Nice view, slow service for the food

answer_text: ['We love your 5 star review about your recent experience with us at Bokan. We are thrilled to read that you enjoyed your time so much with us and it was the perfect spot for a sundowner. We are really looking forward to welcoming you back soon. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ["Spotted this place whilst staying at neighbouring hotel in the Docklands area and thought we'd give it a go on a Saturday night.", "We were lucky enough to get a table to enjoy the magnificent views over London. It's a perfect spot for a sundowner and my wife loved the 'British Maori' cocktail. Staff were friendly and we really enjoyed the live band and funky house music later into the night. We'll definitely return next time we're in London."]
title: Stunning Sky Bar

answer_text: ['Thank you Lia M for taking the time to review your recent experience in Bokan 38. I am so pleased you joined us for your birthday and I hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future. Thank you. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ["The place it's situated on the 38th floor of Novotel which gives an amazing view.", "It has 3 floors: terrace, bar & restaurant. The food is very good and since the location, it's a special one the prices are pretty high.", 'I was on vacation in London and it happened to had my birthday on that night that I visited it so it was the perfect venue for it.', "It's a place you have to check if you are passing London."]
title: Very nice place

answer_text: ['We are thrilled that you enjoyed your time with us in Bokan and loved the views like we do. I am thrilled with the 5 star review and especially about how friendly our Bar Talent are, we think so too :). Looking forward to welcoming you back soon. Many thanks. Jacqui & The Bokan Bar Family']
content: ['Both bars very nice, decor lovely, views amazing. Will definitately be visiting again. Very friendlubar staff.']
title: Great Views

answer_text: ['We love your review GrumpyQS and we agree we think we have the best views in town too. We are currently looking at another supplier so hopefully we will increase our range of beers by the time you come back to see us. Thanks again for the review. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['This place has a real buzz about it and some of the best views in town. Perhaps a wider range of beers would be beneficial but overall well worth a visit!']
title: Amazing views!

answer_text: ['Thank you so much Smulji9 for your fabulous 5 star review of London, we loved reading it. Our toilets are very famous for the amazing views, glad you liked them :). I am sure we will be welcoming you back soon and we are looking forward to it. Thanks again. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['The atmosphere here was lovely. The view was the best I had seen in London. We were able to see every landmark and the meandering river. Even the bathroom has great views! Cocktails were skilfully made. ']
title: Best view of London!
